mapper.sql: edo.id as id,edo.deployment_order_no as deployment_order_no,edo.deployment_type as deployment_type,edo.src_warehouse_id as src_warehouse_id,edo.src_warehouse_position_id as src_warehouse_position_id,edo.target_warehouse_id as target_warehouse_id,edo.target_warehouse_position_id as target_warehouse_position_id,edo.deployment_order_status as deployment_order_status,edo.total_product_count as total_product_count,edo.total_product_amount as total_product_amount,edo.total_material_count as total_material_count,edo.total_material_amount as total_material_amount,edo.total_order_amount as total_order_amount,edo.total_discount_amount as total_discount_amount,edo.expect_return_time as expect_return_time,edo.data_status as data_status,edo.remark as remark,edo.create_time as create_time,edo.create_user as create_user,edo.update_time as update_time,edo.update_user as update_user

edop.id as product_id,edop.deployment_order_id as product_deployment_order_id,edop.deployment_order_no as product_deployment_order_no,edop.deployment_product_sku_id as product_deployment_product_sku_id,edop.deployment_product_unit_amount as product_deployment_product_unit_amount,edop.deployment_product_amount as product_deployment_product_amount,edop.deployment_product_sku_count as product_deployment_product_sku_count,edop.deployment_product_sku_snapshot as product_deployment_product_sku_snapshot,edop.is_new as product_is_new,edop.data_status as product_data_status,edop.remark as product_remark,edop.create_time as product_create_time,edop.create_user as product_create_user,edop.update_time as product_update_time,edop.update_user as product_update_user

edom.id as material_id,edom.deployment_order_id as material_deployment_order_id,edom.deployment_order_no as material_deployment_order_no,edom.deployment_material_id as material_deployment_material_id,edom.deployment_material_unit_amount as material_deployment_material_unit_amount,edom.deployment_material_amount as material_deployment_material_amount,edom.deployment_product_material_count as material_deployment_product_material_count,edom.deployment_product_material_snapshot as material_deployment_product_material_snapshot,edom.is_new as material_is_new,edom.data_status as material_data_status,edom.remark as material_remark,edom.create_time as material_create_time,edom.create_user as material_create_user,edom.update_time as material_update_time,edom.update_user as material_update_user
mapper.select:
SELECT deployment_order_main.*
FROM ( SELECT
ews.warehouse_name AS src_warehouse_name, ewt.warehouse_name AS target_warehouse_name
FROM erp_deployment_order edo LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ews ON ews.id = edo.src_warehouse_id AND ews.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ewt ON ewt.id = edo.target_warehouse_id AND ewt.data_status = 1 WHERE edo.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND edo.data_status = 1 ) deployment_order_main LEFT JOIN erp_deployment_order_product edop ON edop.deployment_order_id = deployment_order_main.id AND edop.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_deployment_order_material edom ON edom.deployment_order_id = deployment_order_main.id AND edom.data_status = 1

SELECT deployment_order_main.*
FROM ( SELECT
ews.warehouse_name AS src_warehouse_name, ewt.warehouse_name AS target_warehouse_name
FROM erp_deployment_order edo LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ews ON ews.id = edo.src_warehouse_id AND ews.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_warehouse ewt ON ewt.id = edo.target_warehouse_id AND ewt.data_status = 1 WHERE edo.deployment_order_no = #{deploymentOrderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND edo.data_status = 1 ) deployment_order_main LEFT JOIN erp_deployment_order_product edop ON edop.deployment_order_id = deployment_order_main.id AND edop.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_deployment_order_material edom ON edom.deployment_order_id = deployment_order_main.id AND edom.data_status = 1
SELECT * FROM erp_deployment_order WHERE src_warehouse_id = #{srcWarehouseId} AND target_warehouse_id = #{targetWarehouseId}
